landing.description: Swap tokens, bridge assets, and provide liquidity with zero friction. Built on Arc's enterprise-grade infrastructure.
Successfully added network to your walle: Successfully added network to your wallet
bridgingWindowNotice: Funds are safe. Even if you close this window or the progress bar slows down, your transaction will complete on-chain once the required confirmations are met. You can track progress in your transaction history.
bridgeFailedTip: If your transaction was sent but the UI failed, your funds are safe. You can check your wallet or transaction history for updates.
bridgeSuccessTip: Your assets are now available on the destination chain. It might take a few seconds for your wallet balance to refresh.
faucet.title: Faucet
faucet.description: Claim free test tokens to test the dApp. You can claim once per 24 hours.
faucet.successMessage: Success! You've received {{symbol}} test tokens. They should appear in your wallet in a few seconds.
faucet.errorMessage: We couldn't process your claim. You might have already reached your daily limit or there's a network issue.
